Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.collections.synchronization

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISynchronizationController
    An instance of this interface is used by the HA sub-system to manage the synchronization of the local node with the rest of the cluster.
    ISynchronizationFailureListener
    The HA synchronization controller uses an instance of this interface to report failures to the HA sub-system.
    ISynchronizationListener
    Instances of this interface are notified by the HA Synchronization Controller when the synchronization state of the local cluster node changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterNodesInSynchronizationOrder
    Class which calculates which ClusterNodes should be included in a synchronization pass and in which order they should be contacted.
    SynchronizationAttemptIntervalCalculator
    Class which calculates the interval when next periodic synchronization attempt should be tried when passive site replication is configured.
    SynchronizationController
    Synchronization controller implementation.
